room_title: Escape room "Medusa's Revenge" by Escape Room Zone in Canton
review: Staff was very thorough. The room was so much fun! We will be coming back!!!

room_title: Escape room "Medusa's Revenge" by Escape Room Zone in Canton
review: Great theme with great puzzles. Did such a great job with the look of the room. What a blast! Staff was helpful and courteous too.

room_title: Escape room "Medusa's Revenge" by Escape Room Zone in Canton
review: I have played many escape rooms, I try to find an escape room every place I go. This is the best escape room I have ever played and its right in my backyard. Definitely will be back. Thanks for the great time!
